GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.25 to before v4.9.334
GSD.description:
capabilities: fix undefined behavior in bit shift for CAP_TO_MASK

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.334 by commit 5b79fa628e2ab789e629a83cd211ef9b4c1a593e, it was introduced in version v2.6.25 by commit e338d263a76af78fe8f38a72131188b58fceb591. For more details please see the references link.
